issue.title: Bradesco Fake Website
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.17.1 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Dangerous site ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://atendimento-resgateib2.com/online/ibpfnovologin/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Hide your User-Agent (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Fake Bradesco Bank: - https://atendimento-resgateib2.com/online/ibpfnovologin/ - http://vps52503.publiccloud.com.br/livesite525 - https://atendimento-desco.grupokustodio.com/online/home.php Official website: https://banco.bradesco 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot N:
